name: Rat Plague
description:
In this game a little village is plagued by rats. Your goal is to cure the infected villagers, but be carefule not to infect yourself.

Help me, there are RATS

The rats will chase and infect you and the villagers.

Don't infect yourself

Every time you come close to a rat, your infection chance will be increased by a random amount. If you are unlucky, you can die any time.

How to play:

When you see particles around a villager, you can aim at them with the little red dot and cure them with E. Every cured villager will increase your score by one and might spawn a new rat.

Movement works with WASD.

Notes

This game is made for the Godot Wild Jam 18 with all wildcards in mind.
